titles.title: Designating majority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

action.text: Mr. LaHood asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/5/1997--Introduced. Elects the following Members to the House Committee on Science: (1) Phil English; (2) George Nethercutt; (3) Tom Coburn; and (4) Pete Sessions.
